artist: Artist: Lorna Miller , et al.; Publisher: Parade, Glasgow
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical illustration of three figures, with text, printed in offset lithography with cyan details on wove paper covers; 40 pp.
medium: Cyan and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: Parade, no. 1
